text:
How do I bake chocolate chip cookies?

A great beginner workout routine starts with 3 days per week. Day 1 focuses on upper body with push-ups, dumbbell rows, and shoulder presses.

text:
Can you explain how photosynthesis works?

Photosynthesis is the process by which plants convert sunlight into energy. Chlorophyll in the leaves absorbs light, which drives the conversion of carbon dioxide and water into glucose and oxygen.

text:

text:

Tomatoes thrive in warm sunny conditions with at least 6 hours of direct light. Plant them after the last frost, spacing them about 24 inches apart. Use stakes or cages for support.
